entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2 except minus 6 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2 except minus 6 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast.
